artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Takenouchi Magohachi; Publisher: Tsuruya Kiemon
catalogue_raissonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 245, horizontal ōban #55.06
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Fifty-three Stations along the Tōkaidō (Tōkaidō gojūsan tsugi no uchi 東海道五十三次之内), also known as the First Tōkaidō or Hōeidō Tōkaidō
text: No. 06 in the series, first version; co-published by Hōeidō and Senkakudō.
title: Totsuka: Motomachi Fork
